Name: TASHA'S HIDEOUS LAUGHTER
Components: V,S, M(tinytarts and afeather that iswaved inthe air)
Description: Acreature ofyour choice that you can see within rangeperceives everything as hilariously funny and fallsinto fitsoflaughter ifthis spell affects it.The targetmust succeed on aWisdom saving throw or faliprone,becoming incapacitated and unable tostand up fortheduration. Acreature with an lntelligence score of4orless isn't affected.Atthe end ofeach ofits turns, and each time ittakesdamage, the target can make another Wisdom savingthrow.
